deployment.secrets: KONOMI_API_KEY stored as secret (env file locally; K8s Secret in kontainer/k8s/secret.example.yaml).
deployment.access_controls: REST gated via X-API-Key; WS gated via api_key query param (demo). Production should use stronger auth + gateway.
deployment.observability: Health endpoint available; recommend request-id structured logs and external monitoring.
deployment.rate_limit: In-memory token bucket is enabled for demo; production should use gateway/redis.
deployment.resource_limits: K8s deployment.yaml includes CPU/memory requests+limits; docker uses host limits.
deployment.rollback: Document rollback: revert to prior image tag + git commit; keep audit bundles for runs.
deployment.image_pinning: Recommend pin by tag+digest in production; demo uses local image tag.
deployment.disclaimer: Research scaffold only; do not expose publicly without security review.
